newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: FORECAST - Dutch company results Feb 24-28.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Dutch company results Feb 24-28.

text.p: Analysts' estimates of Dutch
company results for the week of Feb 24-28:
DATE--COMPANY-----PERIOD--PROFIT------CONSENSUS---RANGE-----PVS
25/2 DSM YR 96 net ord ops 700 --- 1073
26/2 Hagemeyer YR 96 net ord ops 280 262-286 193
26/2 Gist-broc YR 96 net ord ops 158 154-160 144
27/2 ABN AMRO YR 96 net profit 3282 3226-3316 2616
27/2 ABN AMRO YR 96 net attrib 3063 3025-3129 2368
27/2 Akzo Nobel Q4 96 net ord ops 293 273-320 239
27/2 Akzo Nobel YR 96 net ord ops 1319 1300-1347 1312
27/2 Van Ommeren YR 96 net ord ops 93 91-96 92
28/2 Getronics YR 96 net ord ops 131 123-145 98
NOTES - Profit figures exclude extraordinary items and are
in millions of guilders unless otherwise stated.
The DSM figure is a preliminary figure published by DSM on January 28. The company said 1996 net profit from normal operations would be at least 700 million guilders.
ABN AMRO estimates are for overall net profit and for net profit attributable to ordinary shareholders.
Van Ommeren estimates are for bottom-line net profit, excluding any extraordinary items. The 1995 results included an extraordinary charge of 11.4 million guilders.
Reuter Instrument Codes (RICs) for other companies mentioned in the table: Hagemeyer, Gist-brocades, Akzo Nobel, Getronics.

The following securities houses contributed to this survey: Bangert Pontier, Delta Lloyd Bank, Generale Bank, ING, Kempen & Co, Labouchere, Van Lanschot, Suez Nederland, Wijs & Van Oostveen, Wesselius.
-- Amsterdam newsroom +31 20 504 5000, Fax +31 20 504 5040
